title: COMPUTER MANUFACTURER
tecnologics: React JS, Node JS, JavaScript(ES6), Express JS, MongoDB, Firebase
description1: Users can visit all pages and see our users feedback, also user can see all product. User can see product details & also user ordered product.Have user feedback process and order review on user dashboard.Have an admin dashboard where an admin can manage the full site, orders and users. Users cannot visit on admin dashboard.
description2: 1. It's a single page Web App. Where I use React Router.v6 for build this.2. For server side here use heroku server.3. Implement Private Route and Redirect history. And For login process uses Email, Pass and Google. 4. For designing, here I use DaisyUI Tailwind CSS. Also try to make responsive for mobile and dex-top.5. For security I use it JWT Token.

title: CAR WAREHOUSE
tecnologics: React JS, Node JS, JavaScript(ES6), Express JS, MongoDB, Firebase
description1: 1. User can see some product in home page, some product see in the manage inventory page. 2. User can see product details. If user click update button they can single product. Then user can restore & delivered product. 3. User can see all product in Manage Inventory page. User also manage product like update & delete. 4. User can add new Inventory. 5. In My Items page user can only their specific inventory item.
description2: 1. It's a single page Web App. Where I use React Router.v6 for build this.  2. For server side here use heroku server. 3. Implement Private Route and Redirect history. And For login process uses Email, Pass and Google. 4. For designing, here I use React Bootstrap. Also try to make responsive for mobile and dex-top.

title: ENGLISH TUTOR

description2: 1. It's a single page Web App. Where I use React Router.v6 for build this. 2. For login I use firebase login authentication. 3. User login by gmail, google & github
tecnologics: React JS, React Bootstrap, JavaScript(ES6), Firebase
